29.3 Liquidity Risk

Liquidity risk is the risk that Lonza will not be able to meet its ﬁnancial obligations as they fall due. Lonza’s

approach to managing liquidity is to ensure that it will always have sufﬁcient liquidity to meet its liabilities

when due, under both normal and stressed conditions, without incurring unacceptable losses or risking damage to Lonza’s reputation. Group Treasury maintains flexibility in funding also using bilateral and syndicated credit
